q1: Spain has played well in the past do you think next world cup will be their year?
a1: No, I think it'll be Croatia.
a2: Spain will come back full force next time.
q3: i think that Germany will win the next world cup
q4: How many world cups have Spain won?
a4: Spain won its only FIFA World Cup in 2010.
q5: I think Spain is a good team to win the next cup
a5: If Spain has a good team but they do not have a good manager to go far with!
